Description: The oil-like tonic limbers up your muscles.

This dark green healing potion is extremely powerful.
The Healing Keg contains multiple drinks worth of healing potion.
Healing potions repair wounds and restore health when drunk.

Delicious, healthy milk washes out the blood and removes status effects.
You can always make some nice stuff when you're using mithril.
